name: 3D-mascus
description:
A fan game I made for Damascus, created mainly to see how it would look in a 3D, retro FPS fashion.

The first mission, Punk Hazard, requires you to kill Punks that drop pieces of a hazmat suit you need to survive the island. After collecting a full set, the Cursed Yeti will appear. You must kill it to beat the level. But, that won't be the last you've seen of it. After killing the Yeti, you may continue and see how long you can survive the horde.
